description:
Social media-star-turned-boxer Jake Paul is set to fight Hasim Rahman Jr., son of the famous boxer Hasim Rahman, on August 6, 2022, 10:00 PM ET, at Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York.

This fight was scheduled after Jake Paul's fight with Tommy Fury, half-brother of famed boxer Tyson Fury, was cancelled for a second time.

If Jake Paul wins his scheduled bout with Hasim Rahman Jr., this market will resolve to "Jake Paul". If Hasim Rahman Jr. wins his scheduled bout with Jake Paul, this market will resolve to "Hasim Rahman Jr.". 

If this fight ends in a draw, is not officially designated as a win for either Jake Paul or Hasim Rahman Jr., is cancelled, or otherwise is not decided by or moved to a date after August 13, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official reporting from the live boxing match between Jake Paul and Hasim Rahman Jr., however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

markets.question: Who will win Jake Paul vs. Hasim Rahman Jr.?
